h2_title: The Five Carts and Bishui Cave
img_above_text:
# Chapter 5 Secrets

## The Five Carts and Bishui Cave
img_below_text: At the start of Chapter 5, you’ll encounter the Pale-Axe Stalwart. He’ll ask you to destroy the Five Carts in Chapter 5, but you’ll only actually need to tackle 4 of them. 3 of these can be found along the main path, but one can be found if you double back on yourself after the rolling spiked ball has gone toward the end of the chapter and enter the Cooling Slope.
